sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_89b77d944794d910d614699e536d43d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>7e0b251e9734555051e136c71153afe5</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get Requests using Request Number</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    response.setContentType('application/json');
    body = {};

    var requestNumber, grRequest, reqDetails = [];
	var oimUtils = new OracleIdentityManagerUtils();

    var requestQueryParams = request.queryParams;
    if (!requestQueryParams.requestNumber) {
        response.setStatus(200);
        grRequest = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
        grRequest.orderByDesc("number");
        grRequest.query();
        while (grRequest.next()) {
            reqDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(grRequest, "object"));
        }
        response.setBody(reqDetails);
        return response;
    } else {
		var request_number = requestQueryParams.requestNumber.toString();
        grRequest = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
        grRequest.addQuery("number", request_number);
        grRequest.query();
        if (!grRequest.next()) {
            response.setStatus(404);
            body.text = "Request Number is not present in the system, ID: " + correlation_id;
            body.error = "request_id_not_found";
            response.setBody(body);
            return response;
        } else {
            response.setStatus(200);
            reqDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(grRequest, "object"));
            response.setBody(reqDetails);
            return response;
        }
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_paler_oim_rm/request_management/get_request_number</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_request_number</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-21 05:31:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>89b77d944794d910d614699e536d43d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Requests using Request Number</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_89b77d944794d910d614699e536d43d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-26 07:12:10</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Request Management">58563d544794d910d614699e536d43aa</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4017f5944794d910d614699e536d438d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>7e0b251e9734555051e136c71153afe5</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Access Request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(request, response) {

    response.setContentType('application/json');
    body = {};

    var catalog_item, requested_for, user_table, catalog_item_sys_id;
    var variables = {},
        varJSON = {};
	var oimUtils = new OracleIdentityManagerUtils();
    
    var requestQueryParams = request.queryParams;
    var itemID = requestQueryParams.itemID;
    if (itemID == null || itemID == "" || itemID == " ") {
        response.setStatus(404);
        body.text = "Item ID is missing.";
        body.error = "item_id_missing";
        response.setBody(body);
    } else
        catalog_item = itemID;

    var requestBody = request.body.nextEntry();
    var items = requestBody.items;
    var msg = items;
    if (items) {
        if (!msg.hasOwnProperty("variables")) {
            response.setStatus(400);
            body.text = "Request fields/variables are missing.";
            body.error = "request_variables_missing";
            response.setBody(body);
        } else {
            variables = msg.variables;
            requested_for = msg.variables.requested_for;
            var keys = Object.keys(variables);
            for (var item_variable in keys) {
                varJSON[keys[item_variable]] = variables[keys[item_variable]];
            }

            var catalog_item_table = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
            catalog_item_table.addQuery('active', 'true');
            catalog_item_table.addQuery('sys_id', catalog_item);
            catalog_item_table.query();

            if (catalog_item_table.next())
                catalog_item_sys_id = catalog_item_table.sys_id;
            else {
                response.setStatus(404);
                body.text = "The requested catalog item could not be found: " + catalog_item;
                body.error = "catalog_item_not_found";
                response.setBody(body);
                return response;
            }

            if (!oimUtils.userTableConsent()) {
                response.setStatus(403);
                body.text = "The user table access is not granted. Please contact App Admin/Instance Admin.";
                body.error = "user_access_not_granted";
                response.setBody(body);
                return response;
            } else {
                user_table = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
                user_table.addQuery('active', 'true');
                user_table.addQuery('sys_id', requested_for);
                user_table.query();
                if (user_table.next())
                    requested_for = user_table.sys_id;
                else {
                    response.setStatus(404);
                    body.text = "The user specified could not be found " + requested_for;
                    body.error = "user_not_found";
                    response.setBody(body);
                    return response;
                }
            }
            var cart = new sn_sc.CartJS();
            var requestCatalogItem = {
                'sysparm_id': catalog_item_sys_id.toString(),
                'sysparm_requested_for': requested_for.toString(),
                'sysparm_quantity': '1',
                'variables': JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(varJSON))
            };
            var cartDetails = cart.orderNow(requestCatalogItem);

            var reqDetails = [],
                requestKeys = [],
                grfields = [];
            for (var key in msg.variables) {
                requestKeys.push(key.toString());
            }
            var fields = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
            fields.addEncodedQuery('name=sc_request^ORname=task^internal_type!=collection^ORinternal_type!=NULL');
            fields.query();
            while (fields.next()) {
                grfields.push(fields.element.toString());
            }
            var filteredFieldList = grfields.filter(function(n) {
                return requestKeys.indexOf(n) !== -1;
            });

            if (cartDetails.hasOwnProperty('cart_id')) {
                response.setStatus(403);
                body.text = "Two step checkout is enabled. Please contact App Admin/Instance Admin to diable it or provide the access to edit the property.";
                body.error = "two_step_checkout_enabled";
                response.setBody(body);
                return response;
            } else {
                var requestNumber = cartDetails.request_number;

                response.setStatus(201);
                body.text = "The request was submitted successfully";

                var REQ_table = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
                REQ_table.addQuery('number', requestNumber);
                REQ_table.query();

                if (REQ_table.next()) {
                    REQ_table.requested_for = requested_for;
                    for (var j = 0; j < filteredFieldList.length; j++) {
                        REQ_table[filteredFieldList[j].toString()] = msg.variables[filteredFieldList[j].toString()];
                    }
                    reqDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(REQ_table, "object"));
                    REQ_table.update();
                }
                response.setBody(reqDetails);
                return response;
            }
        }
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_paler_oim_rm/request_management/access_request</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/access_request</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-21 05:29:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>4017f5944794d910d614699e536d438d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Access Request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4017f5944794d910d614699e536d438d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-26 08:28:45</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Request Management">58563d544794d910d614699e536d43aa</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b9b5826947a5d150d614699e536d4370
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_paler_oim_rm.OracleIdentityManagerUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>OracleIdentityManagerUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var OracleIdentityManagerUtils = Class.create();
OracleIdentityManagerUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    convertGrToJSON: function(gr, returnValue) {
        var fields = gr.getElements();
        var recordObj = {};
        for (var i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) {
            var element = fields[i];
            var type = gr.getElement(element.getName()).getED().getInternalType();
            if (type == 'boolean' || type == 'journal_input') {
                (!gs.nil(gr.getDisplayValue(element.getName()))) && (recordObj[element.getName()] = gr.getDisplayValue(element.getName()));
            } else {
                (!gs.nil(gr.getValue(element.getName()))) && (recordObj[element.getName()] = gr.getValue(element.getName()));
            }
        }
        return returnValue == 'str' ? JSON.stringify(recordObj) : recordObj;
    },

    elementAndTablePresent: function(element, table) {
        var elementFlag = false;
        var tableFlag = false;
        var elements = GlideApplicationProperty.getValue("x_paler_oim_rm.elements_to_access").toString().split(",");
        var tables = GlideApplicationProperty.getValue("x_paler_oim_rm.tables_to_access_sys_choice").toString().split(",");
        gs.info(tables);
        for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
            gs.info("Elements: " + elements[i] + " " + element);
            if (elements[i].toString().trim() == element.toString().trim()) {
                elementFlag = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        for (var j = 0; j < tables.length; j++) {
            if (tables[j].toString().trim() == table.toString().trim()) {
                tableFlag = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        return (tableFlag && elementFlag);
    },
	
	userTableConsent: function(){
		return (GlideApplicationProperty.getValue("x_paler_oim_rm.access_user_table").toString() == "true") ? true : false;
	},

    type: 'OracleIdentityManagerUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-26 07:04:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>b9b5826947a5d150d614699e536d4370</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OracleIdentityManagerUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b9b5826947a5d150d614699e536d4370</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-26 08:26:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f5379aa547e5d150d614699e536d43f5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>7e0b251e9734555051e136c71153afe5</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GetUsers</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    response.setContentType('application/json');
    body = {};

    var grUser, userDetails = [];
    var oimUtils = new OracleIdentityManagerUtils();

    if (oimUtils.userTableConsent()) {
        var requestQueryParams = request.queryParams;
        if (!requestQueryParams.userID) {
            response.setStatus(200);
            grUser = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
			grUser.addEncodedQuery("user_nameISNOTEMPTY");
            grUser.orderBy("user_name");
            grUser.query();
            while (grUser.next()) {
                userDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(grUser, "object"));
            }
            response.setBody(userDetails);
            return response;
        } else {
            var user_id = requestQueryParams.userID.toString();
            grUser = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
            grUser.addQuery("user_name", user_id);
            grUser.query();
            if (!grUser.next()) {
                response.setStatus(404);
                body.text = "User is not present in the system, ID: " + user_id;
                body.error = "user_not_found";
                response.setBody(body);
                return response;
            } else {
                response.setStatus(200);
                userDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(grUser, "object"));
                response.setBody(userDetails);
                return response;
            }
        }
    } else {
        response.setStatus(403);
        body.text = "User table access unauthorized. Please contact App Admin/Instance Admin for more information.";
        body.error = "user_table_access";
        response.setBody(body);
        return response;
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_paler_oim_rm/request_management/get_users</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_users</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-26 08:27:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5379aa547e5d150d614699e536d43f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f5379aa547e5d150d614699e536d43f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-22 13:25:07</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Request Management">58563d544794d910d614699e536d43aa</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_db5f9cfc97d1551051e136c71153af17
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="DELETE"><child display_value="">175f58bc97d1551051e136c71153af74</child><cloned>2022-08-11 05:25:11</cloned><last_validated>2022-08-11 05:25:11</last_validated><parent display_value="Portal config">27eb09900b111200b0b02c6317673aff</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>sp_platform</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, $rootScope, $timeout, $http){
	var c = this;

	$timeout(function(){
		c.initModel();
		c.initListeners();
	});

	c.isValidSysId = function(sys_id) {		
		return _.hasIn(c, "data.portal_id") ? (c.data.portal_id === sys_id) : false;
	}

	c.changePortal = function(portal_id) {
		if (c.data.portal_id && c.data.portal_id === portal_id) return;

		c.isPreviewLoading = false;
		c.previewPageUrl = null;
		c.canUndo = false;
		c.data.portal = null;
		c.data.portal_id = portal_id;

		c.server.update().then(function() {
			c.initModel();
		});
	}

	c.initModel = function(){
		c.undoModel = angular.copy(c.data.fieldModel);
		c.themePreviewPage = 'theme_preview';
		c.quickSetupPreviewPage = c.data.portal.homepage;
		c.setPagePreview(c.quickSetupPreviewPage, true);
		$scope.hasTagLineProperties = hasTagLineProperties();
	}

	c.initListeners = function() {
		$rootScope.$on("snImageUploader:complete", c.onUploadComplete); 
		$rootScope.$on("snImageUploader:delete", c.onUploadDelete); 
	}

	c.undo = function(){
		// Sets all of the fields back to their previous values
		c.data.doUndo = true;
		c.data.portal = null;
		c.canUndo = false;
		c.server.update().then(function(){
			c.data.doUndo = false;
			c.setPagePreview(c.activePreviewPage, true);
		});
	};

	c.activePreviewPage = null;
	c.setPagePreview = function (pageId, forceReload) {
		_.defer(setPagePreview, pageId, forceReload);
	};

	function setPagePreview(pageId, forceReload) {
		if (c.activePreviewPage == pageId && !forceReload)
			return;

		var url = null;
		c.activePreviewPage = pageId;
		if (angular.isDefined(pageId) && pageId != null && _.hasIn(c, "data.portal.url_suffix"))
			url = '/' + c.data.portal.url_suffix + '?id=' + pageId;
		$scope.$broadcast('this.renderPreviewPage', url);
	}

	// defer invoking until current call stack has clear, avoid blocking UI rendering


	c.refreshPreview = function(){
		var el = angular.element("iframe[data-portal-id='" + c.data.portal_id+ "']");
		var iframe = el.get(0);
		if (iframe)
			iframe.contentWindow.location.reload(true);
	}

	c.onLogoChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		c.canUndo = true;
		$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setLogo', newValue.split('?')[0]);
	};

	c.onHeroChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		c.canUndo = true;
		$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setHero', c.data.fieldModel.hero.container, newValue.split('?')[0]);
	};

	c.onUploadComplete = function(event, sys_id, response) {
		if (!c.isValidSysId(sys_id)) return;
		c.refreshPreview();
	}

	c.onUploadDelete = function(event, sys_id) {
		if (!c.isValidSysId(sys_id)) return;
		c.refreshPreview();
	}

	var titleChangeBounce;
	c.onTitleChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		if (titleChangeBounce) $timeout.cancel(titleChangeBounce);
		titleChangeBounce = $timeout(function() {
			c.canUndo = true;
			$scope.$broadcast('sp.spEditableField.save', field);
			$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setTitle', newValue);
		}, 200);
	}

	var tagLineBounce;
	c.onTagLineChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		if (tagLineBounce) $timeout.cancel(tagLineBounce);
		tagLineBounce = $timeout(function() {
			$scope.$broadcast('sp.spEditableField.save', field);
			c.canUndo = true;
			$rootScope.$broadcast('this.refreshTagline', c.data.fieldModel.tagline.sys_id);
		}, 250);
	}

	var theme = $scope.theme = {};
	var delaySaveThemeCss = _.debounce(saveThemeCss, 500);

	theme.logoPaddingX = function(val) {
		val = _.isNil(val) ? c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-x'] : val;
		val = parseNumber(val, 0);
		return val;
	}

	theme.logoPaddingY = function(val) {
		val = _.isNil(val) ? c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-y'] : val;
		val = parseNumber(val, 0);
		return val;
	}

	$scope.setLogoPaddingX = function(event, value) {		
		c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-x'] = value + 'px';
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}

	$scope.setLogoPaddingY = function(event, value) {		
		c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-y'] = value + 'px';
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}	

	$scope.setThemeProp = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		var v = c.data.cssVariables[field.name];
		if (v == newValue)
			return;
		c.data.cssVariables[field.name] = newValue;
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}

	function hasTagLineProperties() {
		return _.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.tagline.field") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.taglineColor") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.homepageBackgroundColor") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.hero.field");
	}

	var saving = false;
	var saveTimeout;

	function getFlatCssVariables(list) {
		var result = "";
		_.forEach(list, function(val, key) {
			result += key + ': ' + val + ';\n';
		});
		return result;
	}

	function getCurrentCssVariables(portalId) {
		var url = '/api/now/table/sp_portal/' + portalId;
		var params = {params: {sysparm_fields: 'css_variables'}};
		return $http.get(url, params).then(function(data) {
			return data.data.result.css_variables;		
		});
	}

	function replaceExistingVariables(css) {
		var reg = /(\$[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s]+):(.*);/g;
		css = css.replace(reg, function(match, key1, value1) {						
			_.forEach(c.data.cssVariables, function(value2, key2) {							
				if (key1 == key2) {
					match = match.replace(value1, value2);
					delete c.data.cssVariables[key2];
					return false;
				}
			});
			return match;
		});
		return css;
	}

	function saveThemeCss() {
		if (saving) return;
		if (_.isNil(c.data.portal_id)) {
			console.warn("Save: portal_id is undefined");
			return;
		}

		$timeout.cancel(saveTimeout);
		saveTimeout = $timeout(function(){
			c.canUndo = true;
			saving = true;
			getCurrentCssVariables(c.data.portal_id).then(function(css) {
				css = replaceExistingVariables(css);
				var data = {css_variables: getFlatCssVariables(c.data.cssVariables) + css};
				var params = {params:{
					sysparm_records:c.data.portal_id, 
					sysparm_view:'default',
					sysparm_fields:'css_variables'
				}};
				$http.put('/api/now/ui/table_edit/sp_portal', data, params).success(function(){
					$rootScope.$broadcast('this.resetPageCss');
					saving = false;
				});
			})
			
		}, 0);
	}


	function getDescendantProp(obj, key) {
			var arr = key.split(".");
      while(arr.length && (obj = obj[arr.shift()]))
			return obj;
	}

	function parseNumber(val, defaultValue) {
		if (_.isNil(val) || _.isEmpty(val))
			return defaultValue;		

		val = _.isString(val) ? parseInt(val, 10) : val;
		val = _.isNaN(val) ? defaultValue : val;	
		return val;
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>$be_height: calc(100vh - 60px);
$be_width: calc(100vw - 300px);

[role="portal-config"] span[table] {

</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>A widget used by the Branding Editor page to preview global changes to a portal and its theme.</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>widget-portal-config</id><internal>true</internal><link><![CDATA[function(scope, element, attrs, c, transclude){

	var iframeContext;
	var $el;
	var iframeScope;
	var saveCount = 0;
	var $timeout = $injector.get('$timeout');

	//$(window).on('resize', function(){
	//	setFrameHeight();
	//});

	element.find('iframe').load(init);

	scope.$on('this.renderPreviewPage', function(e, url){
		c.isPreviewLoading = false;
		c.previewPageUrl = null;

		if (url) {
			c.isPreviewLoading = true;
			// This is crazy but necessary to properly attach the onload
			// handler after the pageUrl changes.
			$timeout(function(){
				c.previewPageUrl = url;
				$timeout(function(){
					element.find('iframe').load(init);
				});
			})
		}
	});

	function init(){
		try {
			iframeContext = element.find('iframe').get(0).contentWindow;
			$el = iframeContext.$('body');
		}catch(e){
			return;
		}

		var iframeBody = iframeContext.$('body');
		
		if (typeof(iframeBody) === "undefined" || iframeBody === null)
			return;
		
		iframeScope = iframeBody.scope();
		//setFrameHeight();
		scope.$apply(function(){
			c.isPreviewLoading = false;
		});
	}

	function setFrameHeight(){
		var navbarHeight = $('nav').height();
		var windowHeight = $(window).height();
		var extra = 20;
		element.find('iframe').height(windowHeight - navbarHeight - extra);
	}

	scope.$on('this.setLogo', function(e, logo){
		iframeScope.$apply(function() {
			iframeScope.portal.logo = logo;
		});
	});

	scope.$on('this.setTitle', function(e, title){
		iframeScope.$apply(function() {
			iframeScope.portal.title = title;
		});
	});

	scope.$on('this.refreshTagline', function(e, rectSysId){
		var rectScope = $el.find('#x' + rectSysId).scope();
		rectScope.server.refresh();
	});

	scope.$on('this.setHero', function(e, container, image) {
		var containerSelector = '.c' + container.sys_id;

		var bg = {};
		bg["background-color"] = container.background_color;
		bg["background-image"] = "url('"+ image +"')";

		switch (container.background_style){
			case "default":
				bg["background-size"] = "initial";
				bg["background-position"] = "center center";
				break;
			case "cover":
				bg["background-size"] = "cover";
				bg["background-position"] = "center center";
				break;
			case "contain":
				bg["background-size"] = "contain";
				bg["background-repeat"] = "no-repeat";
				bg["background-position"] = "center center";
				break;
			case "repeat":
				bg["background-repeat"] = "repeat";
				break;
		}

		iframeScope.$apply(function(){
			$el.find(containerSelector).scope().container.background = JSON.stringify(bg);
		});

	});

	scope.$on('this.resetPageCss', function(e){
		$el[0].innerHTML = "";
		var iframe = element.find('iframe');
		iframe.attr("src",iframe.attr("src"));
		return;

		var href;
		iframeContext.$('link[type="text/css"]').each(function(){
			href = $(this).attr('href')
			if (href.indexOf('.scss') > -1) {
				$(this).attr('href', href += '&' + (saveCount++));
			}
		})
	});


}]]></link><name>Portal config</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function(){
	data.tagLineMsg = gs.getMessage("Tag Line");
	data.tagLineColorMsg = gs.getMessage("Tag Line color");
	data.homepageBkgdColorMsg = gs.getMessage("Homepage background color");
	data.bkgdImageMsg = gs.getMessage("Background Image");
	data.quickSetupMsg = gs.getMessage("Quick Setup");
	data.themeColorsMsg = gs.getMessage("Theme Colors");
	data.portalTitleMsg = gs.getMessage("Portal title");
	var portalId, portalGr, qsConfig;
	var backupImageSuffix = "_sp_bak";
	data.portalTable = "sp_portal";
	data.fieldModel = {};
	data.undoModel = {};
	
	if (input) {
		portalId = input.portal_id;
		portalGr = $sp.getRecord(data.portalTable, portalId);
		gs.getUser().setPreference('sp.portal', portalGr.getValue("url_suffix"));
		qsConfig = portalGr.getValue('quick_start_config');

		if (input.doUndo === true)
			processUndo(portalGr, input, qsConfig);

	} else {
		// Query for the portal using preference
		portalGr = new GlideRecord(data.portalTable);
		portalGr.addQuery('url_suffix', gs.getUser().getPreference('sp.portal'));
		portalGr.query();
		
		if (!portalGr.hasNext()) {
			portalGr.initialize();
			portalGr.query();
		}
			
		if (portalGr.next()) {
			portalId = portalGr.getUniqueValue();
			qsConfig = portalGr.getValue('quick_start_config');
		} else {
			gs.error("Portal config - Could not find any Service Portals");
		}				
	}
	
	data.outOfScope = !portalGr.isInSelectedScope();
	data.recordScopeLabel = gs.getScopeLabelByRecordId(portalGr.getUniqueValue());
	data.currentScopeLabel = gs.getCurrentApplicationName();
	
	main(data, portalGr, qsConfig);

	function main(data, portalGr, qsConfig) {
		
		var portalForm = $sp.getForm(data.portalTable, portalId);
		data.hasQsConfig = (qsConfig) ? true : false;
		data.portal_id = portalGr.getUniqueValue();
		data.portal = {
			theme: portalGr.getValue('theme'),
			homepage: portalGr.getDisplayValue("homepage"),
			url_suffix: portalGr.getValue("url_suffix"),
			displayValue: portalGr.getDisplayValue(),
			value: portalGr.getUniqueValue()
		};

		data.colorModel = getQuickStartColorModel();
		data.cssVariables = getVariableValues(data.colorModel, data.portal_id);
		data.fieldModel.title = getFieldModel(portalForm._fields.title, data.portalTable, portalId);
		data.fieldModel.logo = getImageModel(portalForm._fields.logo, data.portalTable, portalId);
		if (qsConfig) {
		    qsConfig = JSON.parse(qsConfig)[0];
			var homepageSearchRect = $sp.getForm(qsConfig.tagline.table, qsConfig.tagline.sys_id);
			data.fieldModel.tagline = getFieldModel(homepageSearchRect._fields[qsConfig.tagline.field], qsConfig.tagline.table, qsConfig.tagline.sys_id);
			data.undoModel.tagline = homepageSearchRect._fields[qsConfig.tagline.field].value;
			data.fieldModel.hero = getHeroModel(qsConfig.hero_background);
			data.fieldModel.homepageBackgroundColor = data.colorModel[0].variables[1];
			data.fieldModel.taglineColor = data.colorModel[0].variables[0];
			prepUserImageForUndo(qsConfig.hero_background.table, qsConfig.hero_background.sys_id, qsConfig.hero_background.field);
		}

		// Prep the undo model
		prepUserImageForUndo(data.portalTable, portalId, 'logo');
		data.undoModel.title = portalForm._fields.title.value;
		data.undoModel.cssVariables = portalGr.getValue('css_variables') || '';
	}

	function processUndo(portalGr, input, qsConfig) {
		// Undo title
		portalGr.setValue('title', input.undoModel.title);
		// Undo css_variables
		portalGr.setValue('css_variables', input.undoModel.cssVariables);
		portalGr.setForceUpdate(true);
		portalGr.update();
				
		if (typeof(qsConfig) === "string") {
			qsConfig = JSON.parse(qsConfig)[0];		
		}
				
		if (qsConfig) {
			// Undo tagline
			var taglineGr = new GlideRecord(qsConfig.tagline.table);
			taglineGr.get(qsConfig.tagline.sys_id);
			taglineGr.setValue(qsConfig.tagline.field, input.undoModel.tagline);
			taglineGr.update();			
			
			// Undo logo
			restoreUserImageFromBackup(portalGr.getTableName(), portalGr.getUniqueValue(), 'logo');

			// Undo hero background
			restoreUserImageFromBackup(qsConfig.hero_background.table, qsConfig.hero_background.sys_id, qsConfig.hero_background.field);		
		}
	}

	function getFieldModel(fieldModel, table, sys_id) {
		// Don't show mandatory markers because they are ugly
		fieldModel = fieldModel || {};
		fieldModel.sys_mandatory = false;
		fieldModel.mandatory = false;
		return {field: fieldModel, table: table, sys_id: sys_id };
	}

	function getImageModel(fieldModel, table, sys_id) {
		var m = getFieldModel(fieldModel, table, sys_id);
		m.field.table = table;
		m.field.sys_id = sys_id;
		return m;
	}

	function getHeroModel(heroConfig) {
		var homepageMainContainer = $sp.getForm(heroConfig.table, heroConfig.sys_id);
		var heroGr = $sp.getRecord(heroConfig.table, heroConfig.sys_id);
		var m = getImageModel(homepageMainContainer._fields[heroConfig.field], heroConfig.table, heroConfig.sys_id);
		m.container = {
			background_color: heroGr.getValue('background_color'),
			background_style: heroGr.getValue('background_style'),
			sys_id: heroGr.getUniqueValue()
		};
		return m;
	}

	function deleteBackupImages(tableSysId) {
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		var grThumb;
		gr.addQuery('table_name', 'CONTAINS', backupImageSuffix);
		gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', tableSysId);
		gr.query();
		deleteAttachmentsAndThumbnails(gr);
	}

	function deleteAttachmentsAndThumbnails(attachmentGR) {
		while (attachmentGR.next()) {
			gs.print('Service Portal Branding Editor deleting temporary sys_attachment and thumbnails: ' + attachmentGR.getUniqueValue());
			attachmentGR.deleteRecord();
		}
	}
	
	function prepUserImageForUndo(tableName, tableSysId, fieldName) {
		deleteBackupImages(tableSysId);
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
		attachment.copy(tableName, tableSysId, tableName + backupImageSuffix, tableSysId);

		// rename so it doesn't get deleted when a new image is uploaded
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', tableSysId);
		gr.addQuery('table_name', 'CONTAINS', backupImageSuffix);
		gr.addQuery('file_name', 'CONTAINS', fieldName);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()){
			var f = gr.getValue('file_name') + backupImageSuffix;
			gr.setValue('file_name', f);
			gr.update();
		}
	}

	function restoreUserImageFromBackup(tableName, tableSysId, fieldName) {
		// Delete file_name and its thumbnails
		var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		var grThumb, f, t;
		gr.addQuery('file_name', fieldName);
		gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', tableSysId);
		gr.query();
		deleteAttachmentsAndThumbnails(gr);
		
		// this renames the attachments:
		//   file_name_sp_bak -> file_name
		// and
		//   table_name_sp_bak -> table_name
		gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', tableSysId);
		gr.addQuery('table_name', 'CONTAINS', backupImageSuffix);
		gr.addQuery('file_name', 'CONTAINS', fieldName);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()){
			f = gr.getValue('file_name').replace(backupImageSuffix, '');
			t = gr.getValue('table_name').replace(backupImageSuffix, '');
			gr.setValue('file_name', f);
			gr.setValue('table_name', t);
			gr.update();
		}
	}

	function getQuickStartColorModel(){
		var varModel = [
			{title: "", variables: [
				{label: "${Tagline color}", name: "$sp-tagline-color", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Homepage background color}", name: "$sp-homepage-bg", type: "color"}
			]},
			{title: "${Navbar}", variables: [
				{label: "${Navbar background}", name: "$navbar-inverse-bg", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Navbar divider}", name: "$sp-navbar-divider-color", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Navbar link color}", name: "$navbar-inverse-link-color", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Navbar link hover}", name: "$navbar-inverse-link-hover-color", type: "color"}
			]},
			{title: "${Brand}", variables: [
				{label: "${Page background}", name: "$body-bg", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Panel background}", name: "$panel-bg", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Button default background}", name: "$btn-default-bg", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Primary}", name: "$brand-primary", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Success}", name: "$brand-success", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Info}", name: "$brand-info", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Warning}", name: "$brand-warning", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Danger}", name: "$brand-danger", type: "color"}
			]},
			{title: "${Text}", variables: [
				{label: "${Text color}", name: "$text-color", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Text success}", name: "$state-success-text", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Text muted}", name: "$text-muted", type: "color"},
				{label: "${Link color}", name: "$link-color", type: "color"}
			]}
		];
		return varModel;
	}

	function getVariableValues(colorModel, portalId){
		var keys = ["$sp-logo-margin-y","$sp-logo-margin-x"];
		var g, v, group, variable;
		for(g in colorModel) {
			group = colorModel[g];
			for (v in group.variables){
				variable = group.variables[v];
				keys.push(variable.name);
			}
		}
		var variableValues = $sp.buildThemeVariableModel(portalId, keys.join(","));

		// Put the values into the colorModel
		for(g in colorModel) {
			group = colorModel[g];
			for(v in group.variables) {
				variable = group.variables[v];
				variable.value = variableValues[variable.name];
			}
		}

		return variableValues;
	}

	function restoreTheme(themeSysId, variables) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sp_theme");
		if (gr.get(themeSysId)) {
			gr.setValue("css_variables", variables);
			gr.update();
		}
	}

})()

]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-27 17:09:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>27eb09900b111200b0b02c6317673aff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1189</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Portal config</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal Configuration Pages" source="com.glide.service-portal.config">a6b4f80047841110d614699e536d43bd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_27eb09900b111200b0b02c6317673aff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-07 15:12:45</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="flex-row items-stretch" role="branding-editor">

    <aside class="flex-shrink" role="portal-config">
        <div role="portal-picker">
            <sn-record-picker field="c.data.portal" display-field="'title'" display-fields="'url_suffix'"
                              on-change="c.changePortal(val)" table="c.data.portalTable" 
                              search-fields="'title,url_suffix'" options="{allowClear: false}"></sn-record-picker>
            <button class="btn btn-warning btn-block" role="portal-undo"
                    ng-if="c.canUndo" ng-click="c.undo()"><fa name="undo" /> ${Reset Changes}</button>   
      </div>
      
        <div role="portal-config-content" ng-if="c.data.portal">
          <p ng-if="c.data.outOfScope" class="sp-out-of-scope">${This portal is in the <strong>{{data.recordScopeLabel}}</strong> application, but <strong>{{data.currentScopeLabel}}</strong> is your current application}</p>
          <uib-tabset justified="true">
                <uib-tab select="c.setPagePreview(c.quickSetupPreviewPage)" heading="{{::data.quickSetupMsg}}">
               
                  
<!-- tab: quick setup -->
<div class="panel panel-default">
    <div class="panel-heading">
        <h3 class="panel-title">${Title and Logo}</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="panel-body">

        <sp-editable-field2
                editable-by-user="true"
                table="{{c.data.fieldModel.title.table}}"
                table-id="c.data.fieldModel.title.sys_id"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.title.field"
                on-change="c.onTitleChange"
                label="{{::data.portalTitleMsg}}"></sp-editable-field2>

        <sp-editable-field2
                class="logo"            
                editable-by-user="true"
                table="{{c.data.fieldModel.logo.table}}"
                table-id="c.data.fieldModel.logo.sys_id"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.logo.field"
                on-change="c.onLogoChange"
                on-submit="logoSubmit"></sp-editable-field2>

        <div class="slider-group form-group" ng-if="c.data.fieldModel.logo.field.displayValue != ''">
            <label>${Logo Padding}</label>
            <div class="sl-x">
                <div class="sl-label">${Left}:</div>
                <div class="sl-element">
                    <slider ng-model="theme.logoPaddingX" ng-model-options="{getterSetter: true}" min="2" max="15"
                            on-stop-slide="setLogoPaddingX($event, value)"
                            updateevent='["slideStop"]'/>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div>
                <div class="sl-label">${Top}:</div>
                <div class="sl-element">
                    <slider ng-model="theme.logoPaddingY" ng-model-options="{getterSetter: true}" min="2" max="15"
                            slider-tooltip-position="bottom" 
                            on-stop-slide="setLogoPaddingY($event, value)"
                            updateevent='["slideStop"]'/>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
    <div class="panel-footer">
        <p>${Use title and logo to represent your brand across all pages of a portal}</p>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="panel panel-default" ng-if="hasTagLineProperties">
    <div class="panel-heading">
        <h3 class="panel-title">${Tag Line and Background}</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="panel-body">
        
        <sp-editable-field2
                editable-by-user="true"
                table="{{c.data.fieldModel.tagline.table}}"
                table-id="c.data.fieldModel.tagline.sys_id"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.tagline.field"
                ng-if="c.data.fieldModel.tagline.field"            
                on-change="c.onTagLineChange"
                label="{{::data.tagLineMsg}}"></sp-editable-field2>
      
        <sp-editable-field2
                editable-by-user="true"
                table=""
                table-id="''"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.taglineColor"
                ng-if="c.data.fieldModel.taglineColor" 
                on-change="setThemeProp"
                label="{{::data.tagLineColorMsg}}"></sp-editable-field2>
      
        <sp-editable-field2
                editable-by-user="true"
                table=""
                table-id="''"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.homepageBackgroundColor"
                ng-if="c.data.fieldModel.homepageBackgroundColor"            
                on-change="setThemeProp"
                label="{{::data.homepageBkgdColorMsg}}"></sp-editable-field2>

        <sp-editable-field2
                class="hero"
                editable-by-user="true"
                table="{{c.data.fieldModel.hero.table}}"
                table-id="c.data.fieldModel.hero.sys_id"
                field-model="c.data.fieldModel.hero.field"
                ng-if="c.data.fieldModel.hero.field"            
                label="{{::data.bkgdImageMsg}}"
                on-change="c.onHeroChange"></sp-editable-field2>

    </div>
    <div class="panel-footer">
        <p>${Reinforce your company theme with company graphics and colors}</p>
    </div>
</div>

                </uib-tab>
                <uib-tab select="c.setPagePreview(c.themePreviewPage)" heading="{{::data.themeColorsMsg}}">              
                  
                    <div class="panel panel-default" ng-repeat="group in c.data.colorModel" ng-hide="group.title == ''">
                        <div class="panel-heading">
                            <h3 class="panel-title">{{::group.title}}</h3>
                        </div>
                        <div class="panel-body">
                            <span ng-repeat="vModel in group.variables">
                                <sp-editable-field2 
                                    editable-by-user="true" table="" table-id="''" 
                                    on-change="setThemeProp" 
                                    field-model="vModel"></sp-editable-field2>
                            </span>                           
                        </div>
                    </div>                      
                  
                </uib-tab>
            </uib-tabset>
        </div>
    </aside>
    
    <main clas="flex-grow" role="page-preview">
        <div ng-if="c.isPreviewLoading" class="loading"><h2>${Loading...}</h2></div>
        <iframe data-portal-id="{{c.data.portal_id}}" 
                ng-hide="c.isPreviewLoading" 
                ng-if="c.previewPageUrl.length" 
                ng-src="{{c.previewPageUrl}}"></iframe>
    </main>
</div>
]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-11 05:25:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>db5f9cfc97d1551051e136c71153af17</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>175f58bc97d1551051e136c71153af74</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_db5f9cfc97d1551051e136c71153af17</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-11 05:25:11</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_3557b5944794d910d614699e536d436f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>7e0b251e9734555051e136c71153afe5</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Revoke request</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    response.setContentType('application/json');
    body = {};

    var catalog_item, user_table, requested_for, catalog_item_sys_id, correlation_id;
    var variables = {},
        varJSON = {};
    var oimUtils = new OracleIdentityManagerUtils();

    var requestQueryParams = request.queryParams;
    var itemID = requestQueryParams.itemID;
    if (itemID == null || itemID == "" || itemID == " ") {
        response.setStatus(400);
        body.text = "Item ID is missing.";
        body.error = "item_id_missing";
        response.setBody(body);
        return response;
    } else
        catalog_item = itemID;

    var correlationID = requestQueryParams.correlationID.toString();
    if (correlationID == null || correlationID == "" || correlationID == " ") {
        response.setStatus(400);
        body.text = "Correlation ID is missing.";
        body.error = "correaltion_id_missing";
        response.setBody(body);
        return response;
    } else
        correlation_id = correlationID;

    var grRequest = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
    grRequest.addQuery("number", correlation_id);
    grRequest.query();
    if (!grRequest.next()) {
        response.setStatus(400);
        body.text = "Correlation ID is not present in the system, ID: " + correlation_id;
        body.error = "correlation_id_error";
        response.setBody(body);
        return response;
    }

    var stateCorrelationId = grRequest.getValue('state');

    var requestBody = request.body.nextEntry();
    var items = requestBody.items;
    var msg = items;
    if (!msg.hasOwnProperty("variables")) {
        response.setStatus(400);
        body.text = "Request fields/variables are missing.";
        body.error = "request_variables_missing";
        response.setBody(body);
    } else {
        variables = msg.variables;
        requested_for = msg.variables.requested_for;
        var keys = Object.keys(variables);
        for (var item_variable in keys) {
            varJSON[keys[item_variable]] = variables[keys[item_variable]];
        }

        var catalog_item_table = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        catalog_item_table.addQuery('active', 'true');
        catalog_item_table.addQuery('sys_id', catalog_item);
        catalog_item_table.query();

        if (catalog_item_table.next())
            catalog_item_sys_id = catalog_item_table.sys_id;
        else {
            response.setStatus(404);
            body.text = "The requested catalog item could not be found: " + catalog_item;
            body.error = "catalog_item_not_found";
            response.setBody(body);
            return response;
        }

        if (!oimUtils.userTableConsent()) {
            response.setStatus(403);
            body.text = "The user table access is not granted. Please contact App Admin/Instance Admin.";
            body.error = "user_access_not_granted";
            response.setBody(body);
            return response;
        } else {
            user_table = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            user_table.addQuery('active', 'true');
            user_table.addQuery('sys_id', requested_for);
            user_table.query();
            if (user_table.next())
                requested_for = user_table.sys_id;
            else {
                response.setStatus(404);
                body.text = "The user specified could not be found " + requested_for;
                body.error = "user_not_found";
                response.setBody(body);
                return response;
            }
        }

        var cart = new sn_sc.CartJS();
        var requestCatalogItem = {
            'sysparm_id': catalog_item_sys_id.toString(),
            'sysparm_requested_for': requested_for.toString(),
            'sysparm_quantity': '1',
            'variables': JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(varJSON))
        };
        var cartDetails = cart.orderNow(requestCatalogItem);

        var reqDetails = [],
            requestKeys = [],
            grfields = [];
        for (var key in msg.variables) {
            requestKeys.push(key.toString());
        }
        var fields = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        fields.addEncodedQuery('name=sc_request^ORname=task^internal_type!=collection^ORinternal_type!=NULL');
        fields.query();
        while (fields.next()) {
            grfields.push(fields.element.toString());
        }
        var filteredFieldList = grfields.filter(function(n) {
            return requestKeys.indexOf(n) !== -1;
        });

        if (cartDetails.hasOwnProperty('cart_id')) {
            response.setStatus(403);
            body.text = "Two step checkout is enabled. Please contact App Admin/Instance Admin to disable it or provide the access to edit the property.";
            body.error = "two_step_checkout_enabled";
            response.setBody(body);
            return response;
        } else {
            var requestNumber = cartDetails.request_number;
            response.setStatus(201);
            body.text = "The request was submitted successfully";

            var REQ_table = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
            REQ_table.addQuery('number', requestNumber);
            REQ_table.query();

            if (REQ_table.next()) {
                REQ_table.requested_for = requested_for;
                REQ_table.correlation_id = grRequest.number.toString();
                for (var j = 0; j < filteredFieldList.length; j++) {
                    REQ_table[filteredFieldList[j].toString()] = msg.variables[filteredFieldList[j].toString()];
                }
                reqDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(REQ_table, "object"));
                REQ_table.update();

                grRequest.correlation_id = REQ_table.number.toString();
                grRequest.update();
                grRequest.state = stateCorrelationId;
                grRequest.update();
            }
            reqDetails.push(oimUtils.convertGrToJSON(grRequest, "object"));
            response.setBody(reqDetails);
            return response;
        }
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_paler_oim_rm/request_management/revoke_request</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/revoke_request</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-21 05:30:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>3557b5944794d910d614699e536d436f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Revoke request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management" source="x_paler_oim_rm">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Oracle Identity Manager for Request Management">1c06b9904794d910d614699e536d43bb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3557b5944794d910d614699e536d436f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-16 06:19:25</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Request Management">58563d544794d910d614699e536d43aa</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_175f58bc97d1551051e136c71153af74
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="DELETE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, $rootScope, $timeout, $http){
	var c = this;

	$timeout(function(){
		c.initModel();
		c.initListeners();
	});

	c.isValidSysId = function(sys_id) {		
		return _.hasIn(c, "data.portal_id") ? (c.data.portal_id === sys_id) : false;
	}

	c.changePortal = function(portal_id) {
		if (c.data.portal_id && c.data.portal_id === portal_id) return;

		c.isPreviewLoading = false;
		c.previewPageUrl = null;
		c.canUndo = false;
		c.data.portal = null;
		c.data.portal_id = portal_id;

		c.server.update().then(function() {
			c.initModel();
		});
	}

	c.initModel = function(){
		c.undoModel = angular.copy(c.data.fieldModel);
		c.themePreviewPage = 'theme_preview';
		c.quickSetupPreviewPage = c.data.portal.homepage;
		c.setPagePreview(c.quickSetupPreviewPage, true);
		$scope.hasTagLineProperties = hasTagLineProperties();
	}

	c.initListeners = function() {
		$rootScope.$on("snImageUploader:complete", c.onUploadComplete); 
		$rootScope.$on("snImageUploader:delete", c.onUploadDelete); 
	}

	c.undo = function(){
		// Sets all of the fields back to their previous values
		c.data.doUndo = true;
		c.data.portal = null;
		c.canUndo = false;
		c.server.update().then(function(){
			c.data.doUndo = false;
			c.setPagePreview(c.activePreviewPage, true);
		});
	};

	c.activePreviewPage = null;
	c.setPagePreview = function (pageId, forceReload) {
		_.defer(setPagePreview, pageId, forceReload);
	};

	function setPagePreview(pageId, forceReload) {
		if (c.activePreviewPage == pageId && !forceReload)
			return;

		var url = null;
		c.activePreviewPage = pageId;
		if (angular.isDefined(pageId) && pageId != null && _.hasIn(c, "data.portal.url_suffix"))
			url = '/' + c.data.portal.url_suffix + '?id=' + pageId;
		$scope.$broadcast('this.renderPreviewPage', url);
	}

	// defer invoking until current call stack has clear, avoid blocking UI rendering


	c.refreshPreview = function(){
		var el = angular.element("iframe[data-portal-id='" + c.data.portal_id+ "']");
		var iframe = el.get(0);
		if (iframe)
			iframe.contentWindow.location.reload(true);
	}

	c.onLogoChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		c.canUndo = true;
		$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setLogo', newValue.split('?')[0]);
	};

	c.onHeroChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		c.canUndo = true;
		$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setHero', c.data.fieldModel.hero.container, newValue.split('?')[0]);
	};

	c.onUploadComplete = function(event, sys_id, response) {
		if (!c.isValidSysId(sys_id)) return;
		c.refreshPreview();
	}

	c.onUploadDelete = function(event, sys_id) {
		if (!c.isValidSysId(sys_id)) return;
		c.refreshPreview();
	}

	var titleChangeBounce;
	c.onTitleChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		if (titleChangeBounce) $timeout.cancel(titleChangeBounce);
		titleChangeBounce = $timeout(function() {
			c.canUndo = true;
			$scope.$broadcast('sp.spEditableField.save', field);
			$rootScope.$broadcast('this.setTitle', newValue);
		}, 200);
	}

	var tagLineBounce;
	c.onTagLineChange = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		if (tagLineBounce) $timeout.cancel(tagLineBounce);
		tagLineBounce = $timeout(function() {
			$scope.$broadcast('sp.spEditableField.save', field);
			c.canUndo = true;
			$rootScope.$broadcast('this.refreshTagline', c.data.fieldModel.tagline.sys_id);
		}, 250);
	}

	var theme = $scope.theme = {};
	var delaySaveThemeCss = _.debounce(saveThemeCss, 500);

	theme.logoPaddingX = function(val) {
		val = _.isNil(val) ? c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-x'] : val;
		val = parseNumber(val, 0);
		return val;
	}

	theme.logoPaddingY = function(val) {
		val = _.isNil(val) ? c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-y'] : val;
		val = parseNumber(val, 0);
		return val;
	}

	$scope.setLogoPaddingX = function(event, value) {		
		c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-x'] = value + 'px';
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}

	$scope.setLogoPaddingY = function(event, value) {		
		c.data.cssVariables['$sp-logo-margin-y'] = value + 'px';
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}	

	$scope.setThemeProp = function(g_form, field, oldValue, newValue) {
		var v = c.data.cssVariables[field.name];
		if (v == newValue)
			return;
		c.data.cssVariables[field.name] = newValue;
		delaySaveThemeCss();
	}

	function hasTagLineProperties() {
		return _.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.tagline.field") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.taglineColor") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.homepageBackgroundColor") || 
			_.hasIn(c, "data.fieldModel.hero.field");
	}

	var saving = false;
	var saveTimeout;

	function getFlatCssVariables(list) {
		var result = "";
		_.forEach(list, function(val, key) {
			result += key + ': ' + val + ';\n';
		});
		return result;
	}

	function getCurrentCssVariables(portalId) {
		var url = '/api/now/table/sp_portal/' + portalId;
		var params = {params: {sysparm_fields: 'css_variables'}};
		return $http.get(url, params).then(function(data) {
			return data.data.result.css_variables;		
		});
	}

	function replaceExistingVariables(css) {
		var reg = /(\$[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s]+):(.*);/g;
		css = css.replace(reg, function(match, key1, value1) {						
			_.forEach(c.data.cssVariables, function(value2, key2) {							
				if (key1 == key2) {
					match = match.replace(value1, value2);
					delete c.data.cssVariables[key2];
					return false;
				}
			});
			return match;
		});
		return css;
	}

	function saveThemeCss() {
		if (saving) return;
		if (_.isNil(c.data.portal_id)) {
			console.warn("Save: portal_id is undefined");
			return;
		}

		$timeout.cancel(saveTimeout);
		saveTimeout = $timeout(function(){
			c.canUndo = true;
			saving = true;
			getCurrentCssVariables(c.data.portal_id).then(function(css) {
				css = replaceExistingVariables(css);
				var data = {css_variables: getFlatCssVariables(c.data.cssVariables) + css};
				var params = {params:{
					sysparm_records:c.data.portal_id, 
					sysparm_view:'default',
					sysparm_fields:'css_variables'
				}};
				$http.put('/api/now/ui/table_edit/sp_portal', data, params).success(function(){
					$rootScope.$broadcast('this.resetPageCss');
					saving = false;
				});
			})
			
		}, 0);
	}


	function getDescendantProp(obj, key) {
			var arr = key.split(".");
      while(arr.length && (obj = obj[arr.shift()]))
			return obj;
	}

	function parseNumber(val, defaultValue) {
		if (_.isNil(val) || _.isEmpty(val))
			return defaultValue;		

		val = _.isString(val) ? parseInt(val, 10) : val;
		val = _.isNaN(val) ? defaultValue : val;	
		return val;
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>$be_height: calc(100vh - 60px);
